snippet: Recent developments in health and science news. This week: NASA’s latest moon mission and games that could help older adults.
abstract: The Week column; NASA launches unmanned spacecraft that will study evanescent atmosphere above Moon's surface; craft is in orbit around Earth and will head to Moon in October; other significant developments in health and science news highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Recent developments in health and science news. This week: NASA’s latest moon mission and games that could help older adults.

headline.main: Global Warming’s Impact and Germs That Induce Thinness
headline.print_headline: Global Warming’s Impact and Germs That Induce Thinness
